data.title: Meggitt in agreement to acquire Whittaker Corp.
data.meta_description: Meggitt PLC signed a definitive merger agreement to acquire Whittaker Corp. for about $380 million, Whittaker reported yesterday. The agreement has been approved by both boards of directors. Meggitt, based in Dorset, England, designs and makes products for the aerospace, electronics and industrial controls markets. It reported 1998 sales of $470 million.
